meanings.definition: The top or lid of a barrel.
meanings.sent1: The barrelheads were securely fastened to keep the contents fresh.
meanings.sent2: He struggled to remove the barrelheads to access the wine inside.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to balance on the barrelheads, pretending to be a circus performer.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were like barrelheads, tightly sealed until she was ready to share them.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight glinted off the barrelheads, creating a beautiful pattern on the floor.

meanings.definition: A person who is the head or leader of a group or organization.
meanings.sent1: The barrelheads of the company gathered to discuss the new strategy.
meanings.sent2: She was known as the barrelheads of the local community center.
meanings.sent3: The barrelheads of the book club always had the best book recommendations.
meanings.sent4: He stood tall and proud, like a barrelheads overseeing his team.
meanings.sent5: The barrelheads of the team inspired everyone with their dedication and hard work.
